mapper.select: SELECT t1.dong_name, t2.apt_id aptCode, t2.apt_name aptName, t2.apt_address aptAddress, FROM dong_code t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN apt t2 ON t1.dong_code = t2.dong_code ORDER BY t2.apt_hit DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT t1.dong_name, t2.apt_id aptCode, t2.apt_name aptName, t2.apt_address aptAddress, FROM dong_code t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN apt t2 ON t1.dong_code = t2.dong_code WHERE t1.dong_name = {dongName} ORDER BY t2.apt_hit DESC LIMIT 5
